articles.title: Blast at Jose Cuervo plant in Mexico's Tequila kills at least five people - Reuters Canada
articles.description: An explosion at a Jose Cuervo tequila plant in central Mexico killed at least five company workers and forced the evacuation of tourists from the area in the spirit's hometown of Tequila, the head of the state's emergency services said on Tuesday.
